body:
Hello!

I have a quick question concerning the view analysis component.

When I input a list of BREPS in the _geometry plug, are they also taken into account as obstacles to the view? or should I add them to the context_ plug?

In practice: if I input some building façades in _geometry, _viewpoints can see through façades as if they were transparent when the same façades are not in the context_ plug?



In other words: _geometry can block view rays to other sensors on the same _geometry?



Thank you for your answer. Hope it was clear enough

Pietro
